TopicTitle: Ground science experiments disappear when picking them up

Articles.Content:
My ground experiments disappear when picking them up and aren't visible in my backpack.

But when I get into a ship they get added to storage.  It seems bugged like they're hidden in the backpack...

 

Anyone else have this problem and how do I fix?

 

EDIT: only the first experiment I pick up gets put in the backpack correctly, after that all others are hidden until I enter a ship.

On 11/29/2020 at 10:20 PM, jrolson said:

EDIT: only the first experiment I pick up gets put in the backpack correctly, after that all others are hidden until I enter a ship.

O.K. Sounds like it is a bug that allows you to pick up more than one experiment in the first place. A Kerbals backback is supposed to hold only one experiment.

Nevermind... Seen it's listed as a bug.

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/25930

On 12/6/2020 at 2:19 AM, jrolson said:

Nevermind... Seen it's listed as a bug.

Ah, O.K. Seems I misunderstood you.

But because this seems to be an issue of the inventory system, there is a chance that it will be fixed (or replaced by another bug) in 1.11.
